attributes.action: Help give overcrowded families room to grow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Overcrowded housing robs children of room to grow.

Britain needs more homes now.
The facts are alarming:

In England, nearly one child in every 10 lives in overcrowded housing. Around three-quarters of overcrowded children are forced to share a bedroom with their parents. The legal definition of overcrowding has not been updated since 1935.
As a citizen, you have the opportunity to make a stand and help families suffering in chronically overcrowded conditions.

IsItFair? The expectation on those most vulnerable in society to return to work etc, quite rightly so, but at least give them space along with reform. BeAccounable for your lack of actions...
